title: Subchapter A - Administration
content:
Subchapter A - Administration

State Regulations

Part 2000 - General Purposes (§ 2000.1)

Part 2001 - Definitions (§ 2001.1)

Part 2002 - Public Access To Records (§ 2002.1 to 2002.5)

Part 2003 - Procedures For Declaratory Rulings (§ 2003.1 to 2003.2)

Part 2004 - Limitation, Suspension Or Termination Of Approval Of Loan Or Loan Guarantee Applications (§ 2004.1 to 2004.8)

Part 2005 - Hearing Procedures (§ 2005.1 to 2005.9)

Part 2006 - Suspension And Limitation Of Awards Participation (§ 2006.1 to 2006.5)

Part 2007 - Recovery Of Refunds And Overpayments (§ 2007.1 to 2007.4)

Part 2008 - Special Administrative Relief Provisions (§ 2008.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
